Client.Name: Storacha and the users of our tools
Client.Role: Data onramp entity that provides data onboarding services to multiple clients

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Our journey began with a vision to revolutionize decentralized storage. Building on the foundation of web3.storage and Saturn, we founded Storacha as a community-driven hot storage network. 

We've focused on creating a system that not only enhances storage and retrieval performance but also maintains the core principles of data verifiability and user ownership. Our platform has enterprise-grade capabilities, successfully managing petabyte-scale data operations. 

Storacha serves as a critical scaling layer for organizations looking to leverage the benefits of decentralized storage without compromising on performance or reliability.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: User uploads that meet or adhere to Storacha's Terms of Service (https://docs.storacha.network/terms/).
